trans-unit.source: Marks an object that can propagate outside of an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Marca um objeto que pode ser propagado fora de um <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext" />.

trans-unit.source: When a remote method call is made to an object in another <xref:System.AppDomain>, the current <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> class generates a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> that travels along with the call to the remote location.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma chamada de método remoto é feita em um objeto em outro <xref:System.AppDomain>, atual <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> classe gera uma <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> que viaja junto com a chamada ao local remoto.

trans-unit.source: Only objects that expose the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ILogicalThreadAffinative> interface and are stored in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> are propagated outside the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Somente objetos que expõem o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ILogicalThreadAffinative> interface e são armazenados na <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> são propagadas fora o <xref:System.AppDomain>.

trans-unit.source: Objects that do not support this interface are not transmitted in <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> instances with remote method calls.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que não dão suporte a esta interface não são transmitidos em <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> instâncias com chamadas de método remoto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ILogicalThreadAffinative> interface to transmit [Principal and Identity Objects](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md) to a remote location for identification.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ILogicalThreadAffinative> interface transmita [Principal e objetos de identidade](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md) em um local remoto para identificação.

trans-unit.source: To view the code for the `HelloServiceClass` class used in the sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir o código para o `HelloServiceClass` classe usada no exemplo, consulte o exemplo para o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext.GetData%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To view the code for the server class used in this sample, see example for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.RegisterActivatedServiceType%2A> class.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir o código para a classe de servidor usado neste exemplo, consulte o exemplo para o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.RegisterActivatedServiceType%2A> classe.

trans-unit.source: To view the code for the client class used in the sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir o código para a classe de cliente usada no exemplo, consulte o exemplo para o <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> classe.
